titleStmt.title: A word of advertisement & advice to the godly in Scotland by a Scotch man, and a cordiall vvelwisher to the interests of the godly in Scotland, both in civils and spirituals.
titleStmt.author: Scotch man and a cordial wel-wisher to the interest of the godly in Scotland.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
